title: [QUESTION] Displaying in-memory JSON

Hello. I'm migrating a big Xamarin.Forms project to MAUI. In XF, I was using a different component for Lottie animations now I'm in need to use SKLottieView. My question is: is there a way to display an animation that is stored in memory inside as a JSON string variable? We download JSON animations as strings from our database, because we have many, we can't use too much space for files, and we add new animations on the server side avoiding the need of republishing the app just for new animations. 
Thanks in advance.
